newsitem.title: ARMENIA: SOCCER-ARMENIA AND N.IRELAND DRAW 0-0 IN WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ARMENIA AND N.IRELAND DRAW 0-0 IN WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.

text.p: Armenia and Northern Ireland drew 0-0 in their World Cup group nine qualifying match on Wednesday.

Armenia - 1-Roman Berezovsky, 6-Aramais Yepiskoposyan (15-Vartan Minasyan 87), 2-Yervand Sukiasyan, 5-Michel Ter-Zakarian, 4-Sarkis Hovsepyan, 3-Vartan Khachaturyan, 8-Garnik Avalyan (17-Arsen Avetisyan 75), 9-Hamlet Mkhitaryan, 11-Karapet Mikaelyan, 10-Eric Assadourian, 7-Artur Petrosyan

Northern Ireland - 1-Alan Fettis, 2-Ian Jenkins, 5-Gerry Taggart, 4-Colin Hill, 3-Steve Morrow; 7-Jon McCarthy (15-Philip Mulryne 71), 6-Stephen Lomas, 8-Neil Lennon, 11-Kevin Horlock, 9-Iain Dowie, 10-James Quinn (18-Gerald Mcmahon 59)
